messages.subject: Has anyone gone to iD Tech Camps?
messages.msgSnippet: iD Tech Camps - Ages 7-17 Game Design, Web Design, Programming, Robotics, Video Editing, Photography, Graphic Design for Advertising and more Weeklong
messages.messageBody:
iD Tech Camps - Ages 7-17
Game Design, Web Design, Programming, Robotics, Video Editing, Photography, Graphic Design for Advertising and more
Weeklong Sessions, Beginner to Advanced
Day Camps & Overnight Camps, 70 Locations in the U.S. and Canada

iD Gaming Academy - Ages 13-18

Game Level Design, Game Programming for Xbox 360® and 3D Modeling & Animation with Maya®
2-Week Sessions, Intensive Pre-College Experience held at Prestigious Universities throughout the U.S. and Canada

iD Programming Academy - Ages 13-18

iPhone®, iPad® and Android App Development, C++ & Robotics Engineering and Java Programming for the AP Exam
2-Week Sessions, Intensive Pre-College Experience held at Prestigious Universities throughout the U.S.

iD Visual Arts Academy - Ages 13-18

Film Production-Final Cut Studio®, Film Production-Extreme Sports and Professional Photography
2-Week Sessions, Intensive Pre-College Experience held at Stanford and McGill University
